ItemGroupDef.Name: SUPPDM
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per IDVAR, IDVARVAL, and QNAM value per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: VS
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per vital sign measurement per visit per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: AE
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per adverse event per subject

Description.TranslatedText: Study Day of End of Adverse Event
Study Day of Start of Adverse Event
Reported Term for the Adverse Event
Result or Finding in Original Units

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: NATIVE HAWAIIAN OR OTHER PACIFIC ISLANDER

Description.TranslatedText: Sequential number identifying records within each USUBJID in the domain.
AEENDY = AEENDTC -RFSTDTC+1 if AEENDTC is on or after RFSTDTC. AEENDTC - RFSTDTC if AEENDTC precedes RFSTDTC
AESTDY = AESTDTC - RFSTDTC+1 if AESTDTC is on or after RFSTDTC. AESTDTC - RFSTDTC if AESTDTC precedes RFSTDTC
Age at Screening Date (Screening Date - Birth date). For the complete algorithm see the referenced external document.
Concatenation of BRTHYR, BRTHMO, and BRTHDY in ISO 8601 format

FormalExpression.Context: SAS 9.0 or later, as part of a data step assignment or proc sql select and update statements.

Description.TranslatedText: Domain abbreviation from where data originated.
Data collected in non-standard units (i.e. lbs, inches) is converted using standard conversion factors to standard units (kg, cm).
VSSTRESN = numeric value of VSSTRESC, when VSSTRESC contains numeric data.
RFSTDTC = first date/time of study drug, for safety subject. Null for screen failures.
VSDY = VSDTC-RFSTDTC+1 if VSDTC is on or after RFSTDTC. VSDTC - RFSTDTC if VSDTC precedes RFSTDTC.
Safety subjects only: VSBLFL = 'Y' for last record with non Null VSORRES on or before the first dose date (RFSTDTC). Null otherwise.
When RACE=Multiple the SUPPDM QVALs for RACE1, RACE2 and RACE3 are assigned by this method.
Name of the variables for the related records.
Value of identifying variable described in IDVAR.
The data submitted only includes subjects in the USA since other sites did not enroll any subjects.

Join any Subject Level dataset with the Demographics dataset based on [IG.datasetname]IT.USUBJID = [IG.DM]IT.USUBJID, assuming 'IG.datasetname' is the OID of the ItemGroupDef that defines the subject-level dataset to be joined with the Demographics dataset.
